to your dearest belongings caused by fire, leaking water, burglary or even storms.

SAFEPLACE

What's your Safe Place? Whether it's a location, a person or a hobby, a Safe Place conveys a sense of security, comfort and tranquility. As an insurance company, this is exactly what we want to offer you. That's why you'll find a content hub in the Safe Place tab of our Powerwait App with helpful, exciting and interesting content for all situations in life.
